title: Modeling diurnal and annual ethylene generation from solar-driven electrochemical CO2 reduction devices
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,2453-2467
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00545G, Paper
Kyra M. K. Yap, William J. Wei, Melanie Rodríguez Pabón, Alex J. King, Justin C. Bui, Lingze Wei, Sang-Won Lee, Adam Z. Weber, Alexis T. Bell, Adam C. Nielander, Thomas F. Jaramillo
Integrated solar fuels devices for CO2 reduction (CO2R) are a promising technology class towards reducing CO2 emissions.
